code: @Manual{,   title = {dexid: Generate Memorable Identifiers Using Pokémon Names},   author = {David Schoch},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://schochastics.github.io/dexid/}, }

what: Generate Memorable Identifiers Using Pokémon Names
title: Generate Memorable Identifiers Using Pokémon Names
text: Generate memorable identifiers combining adjectives Pokémon names. Inspired codename-style ID generators, package creates unique fun labels objects, files, projects.

title: Generate Memorable Identifiers Using Pokémon Names
text: can install development version dexid GitHub :

title: Generate Memorable Identifiers Using Pokémon Names
text: main function dexid() generates random identifiers combining adjectives Pokémon names: package supports case styles implemented snakecase package.
code: library(dexid) set.seed(1234)  # Generate 5 basic snake_case IDs dexid(5) #> [1] "wild_namorus"    "similar_andorus" "tame_arganacl"   "shiny_ibarel"    #> [5] "jumbo_leavor"  # Generate 5 Title Case IDs dexid(5, case = "title") #> [1] "Bitter Uraludon"       "Tangible Otad"         "Misguided Zumarill"    #> [4] "Envious Othita"        "Substantial Harmander"  # Generate 5 IDs with random digits dexid(5, add_digits = TRUE) #> [1] "ill_fated_otom_1013" "useful_weilous_4835" "rough_rsaluna_3911"  #> [4] "untidy_uosion_0297"  "shabby_apras_0257"  # Restrict to specific generation dexid(5, gen = 1) #> [1] "awkward_aporeon"  "unknown_enomoth"  "educated_enomoth" "mammoth_rimeape"  #> [5] "elastic_lareon"

what: Generate Random IDs Using Adjectives and Pokemon Names — dexid
title: Generate Random IDs Using Adjectives and Pokemon Names — dexid
text: Creates unique identifiers combining random adjectives Pokemon names different formats.

title: Generate Random IDs Using Adjectives and Pokemon Names — dexid
code: dexid(   n,   gen = 1:9,   case = c("snake", "small_camel", "big_camel", "screaming_snake", "parsed", "mixed",     "lower_upper", "upper_lower", "swap", "all_caps", "lower_camel", "upper_camel",     "internal_parsing", "none", "flip", "sentence", "random", "title"),   add_digits = FALSE,   ... )

title: Generate Random IDs Using Adjectives and Pokemon Names — dexid
text: n integer. Number IDs generate. gen vector integers. generations Pokemon use. Defaults generations. case Character string. case style use. Supports styles implemented package snakecase. add_digits Logical. TRUE, adds random digit end ID. Defaults FALSE. ... arguments passed snakecase::to_any_case().

title: Generate Random IDs Using Adjectives and Pokemon Names — dexid
text: character vector length n containing generated IDs.

title: Generate Random IDs Using Adjectives and Pokemon Names — dexid
